tswitem.name: Enhanced Feedback Loop Module
tswitem.tooltip:
Enhanced Feedback Loop Module
AEGIS-Module (QL 2)
Bind when pickup
Whenever you afflict a target which has an active AEGIS that matches your current AEGIS damage type, you apply a detrimental effect to all enemies near your target which deals 14 / 21 AEGIS damage of your current AEGIS type every second for 4 seconds.
